title: Don’t fear the legendary Billy Volek
author: VD
content_html:
17-3 at halftime. Okay, Daunte’s only thrown for one so far and Moe vultured Mewelde, but I’m standing by my prediction of three TDs passing and two rushing. Oh, and it was tough to see Mr. Volek’s streak of passes without an interception smashed so quickly. Final score = 38-17.

How unfortunate!
content_text:
17-3 at halftime.  Okay, Daunte’s only thrown for one so far and Moe vultured Mewelde, but I’m standing by my prediction of three TDs passing and two rushing.  Oh, and it was tough to see Mr. Volek’s streak of passes without an interception smashed so quickly.  Final score = 38-17.
How unfortunate!
